body:
Debian Jessie (PPC) gives me warnings, which go away with a default empty constructor in `WalletTx`:

```
[...]
  CXX      libbitcoin_server_a-validationinterface.o
  AR       libbitcoin_server.a
  CXX      interfaces/libbitcoin_wallet_a-wallet.o
interfaces/wallet.cpp: In member function Ã¢ÂÂvirtual interfaces::WalletTx interfaces::{anonymous}::WalletImpl::getWalletTx(const uint256&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
         return {};
                 ^
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txin_is_mineÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_is_mineÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]

interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::timeÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::value_mapÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::is_coinbaseÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp: In member function Ã¢ÂÂvirtual interfaces::WalletTx interfaces::{anonymous}::WalletImpl::getWalletTxDetails(const uint256&, interfaces::WalletTxStatus&, interfaces::WalletOrderForm&, bool&, int&)Ã¢ÂÂ:

         return {};
                 ^
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txin_is_mineÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_is_mineÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_addressÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_address_is_mineÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::creditÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member Ã¢ÂÂinterfaces::WalletTx::debitÃ¢ÂÂ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]

[...]
```

title: interface/wallet: get rid of missing initializer warnings
